name: webgl2
description: WebGL2 tools to derisk large GPU projects on the web beyond toys and demos.

scripts.build-debug-wasm-only: cargo build --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --features coverage --profile coverage && node -e "fs.copyFileSync('target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/coverage/webgl2.wasm', 'webgl2.debug.wasm')"
scripts.build-debug-distill: cargo run --bin distill_wasm --features cli -- webgl2.debug.wasm --output webgl2.debug.wasm
scripts.build-debug: npm run build-debug-wasm-only && npm run build-debug-distill
scripts.build: npm run build-release && npm run build-debug
